Headline: Green Line Delays, Limited Service Between Garfield and Cottage Grove
ShortDescription: Green Line service experiencing delays at Garfield; limited service via train shuttle available btwn Cottage Grove & Garfield.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Cottage Grove-bound Green Line trains are experiencing delays near Garfield.

We are running as much service possible with available staff.

As a result, Cottage Grove trains are operating in two sections:

  • between Harlem and Garfield, and,
  • between Garfield and Cottage Grove, with limited service.

For service to Cottage Grove, alight trains at Garfield; shuttle train service to Cottage Grove can be boarded on the Harlem-bound platform side at Garfield.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Green Line Delays
ShortDescription: Green Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at 35th. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Green Line trains are running with residual delays following earlier police activity at 35th.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Blue Line Service Delayed at Austin
ShortDescription: Blue Line trains are standing at Austin due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line trains are standing at Austin due to police activity. 

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
